reviewText: More or less complete selections from a large number of recordings, all in 9.2.1 channels (that is, four height channels added to the usual 5.1 home theater channels). All the selections are well played and the sound is often startlingly real.

I found this to be an extremely useful tool for testing and adjusting my system.  In addition the sampler tracks are well recorded and give you a good idea of what music really sounds like.  This is often a problem because so many recordings are poorly made and/or doctored in the mixing studio.
